JobFullDesc:
You Lead the Way. We’ve Got Your Back.
At American Express, we know that with the right backing, people and businesses have the power to progress in incredible ways. Whether we’re supporting our customers’ financial confidence to move ahead, taking commerce to new heights, or encouraging people to explore the world, our colleagues are constantly redefining what’s possible — and we’re proud to back each other every step of the way. When you join #TeamAmex, you become part of a diverse community of over 60,000 colleagues, all with a common goal to deliver an exceptional customer experience every day. 
Key Responsibilities:
 

Drive both high-level and detailed technical architecture
Conduct engineering and code reviews as needed


Implement new, highly scalable platform components
Improve and maintain existing components of the core platform
Actively participate in team architecture and engineering discussions and forums
Analyze, design, program, debug, and modify software for use in local, networked, cloud-based or Internet-related environments
Responsible for health and quality of the code across the portfolio, including leadership over test coverage, package updates, and CI/CD tool integration

Education & Experience:

Hands-on coding experience in Java (preferably Java 8 and above) and experience building and maintaining services at high traffic/scale as well as experience designing high-level system architecture
Thorough knowledge on functional programming.
Expertise in building fault-tolerant, scalable solutions that are performed at a global enterprise scale
Ability to construct enterprise-grade APIs using state-of-the-art techniques and best practices
Thorough understanding of RESTful, JSON, XML,  HTTP, web services technologies, and data structure fundamentals, with experience in multi-threaded programming


Experience working with testing libraries (like Junit, Mockito, Wire Mock)
Familiar with CICD (using Jenkins, Maven, JMeter, etc.)
Very strong technical troubleshooting and analytical skills with the ability to resolve infrastructure (cloud) and application issues in Production environment


Proficient in cross-platform integration
Able to diagnose, resolve, and prevent the recurrence of system outage
Enjoys iterative, user-driven development that prioritizes user feedback


Experience in Parallel and distributed system


Willingness to learn new technologies and exploit them to their optimal potential
Ability to effectively interpret technical and business objectives and challenges and articulate solutions

 
Big plus:

Experience with Kotlin
Experience on modern/No SQL databases (mongo DB, Redis, Couchbase)
Experience with Splunk, ELK, etc 
Experience with, Kubernetes, Red Hat OpenShift, Docker and similar
Experience working with Jenkins and any open source CICD tools.

 
Qualifications:

Preferably a BTech/BE or Masters degree in computer science, computer engineering, or other technical discipline, or equivalent work experience. 
6 to 9 years of experience with Object-Oriented Design and coding with variety of languages.
Prior experience in high volume, critical, complex and customer applications will be a big plus.
